Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was much better able to impact my learning because its feedback and assistance was immediate, direct and I could tell it exactly what I wanted. Unlike my teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Neither really made me feel anything. But usually trying to get feedback from a teacher is more frustrating because they start by explaining the absolute basics when that is not what you are asking.
